blocks.subject: Re: Western Wholesale Activities - Gas & Power Conf. Call
text: Sara, do you want me to include on the Brokerage Agreement Report any other
updates on the futures or other agreements you are working on?  You can
forward to me and I will make sure it gets added.

blocks.subject: Re: JP Morgan Futures Broker Agreement
raw_header: Subject: Re: JP Morgan Futures Broker Agreement
text: Sent for execution on April 6.  Aneela called JP to hurry them along for
final docs.  You may need to call them as we've not received account
